intro.p: In Fall 2023, Harvard University released their latest Youth Poll where they asked US young adults about their political opinions, voting trends, and views on public service. The Fall 2023 Harvard Youth Poll surveyed {{sample}}, 18 to 29 year old US residents from October 23 through November 6, 2023. Of the poll participants, {{result}}\% {{outcome}}

content.p: What is the population that this study is trying to get information about?

outtro.p: The {{sample}} US adults aged 18 to 29 that were polled.

content.p: What is the variable used for this study?
What type of variable is the variable in question 3?
What is the sample statistic for this study?

outtro.p: The sample statistic is {{result}}\% of those polled {{outcome}}

content.p: What is the parameter of interest for this study? (the population parameter they are trying to gather information about)

outtro.p: The parameter of interest is what percentage of US young adults {{outcome}}
